channel.description: Recent content in spring on Brighton JUG

item.title: Quarkus for Spring Developers with Eric Deandrea
item.description: Quarkus for Spring Developers with Eric Deandrea We are very excited to welcome Eric Deandrea. He will be giving a talk on Quarkus for Spring Developers: In this session, I will show concepts and conventions familiar to Spring developers and how those same concepts and conventions can be implemented in Quarkus, all while highlighting similarities and differences between them. Additionally, I will show similarities and differences in how testing is done, highlighting Quarkus Dev Services.
